entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonSourceGenerator - ArgumentException key already added. #58985
  • Parallel.ForEachAsync hits assert when loop body throws OperationCanceledException #58981
  • improve Immutable by removing or adding some checks #58977

Closed

  • Source generator doesn't support [JsonExtensionData] #58273
    6.0.0
  • AV when running MSBuild on bad invocation of VSD stub #58920
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Emit diagnostics & exceptions for sourcegen handling init-only properties & JsonInclude attributes #58993
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Optimize thread state transition #58992
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Remove a volatile access from TaskScheduler.Id #58991
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix SIMD temp register interference #58990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • CI matrix change: debian+centos+sles #58988
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: ubuntu + mac #58987
  • Remove internal pipelines from coreclr CI matrix #58986
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Return multiple likely classes in getLikelyClass (for better GDV) #58984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Throw on unsupported types in src gen #58983
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Remove duplicates from the AOT data blob. #58982
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Remove benign assert #58980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, and skip any precompiling #58979
    area-Build-mono
  • [mini] Use alloca for runtime_invoke retval buffer #58978
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Merged

  • Support JsonExtensionData in STJ source-gen #58912
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Clear cache after don't stop in a conditional breakpoint #58908
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Reflection nullability API: improve test coverage, fix bug found #58479
    area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0

Updated

  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Create a parent CMake project for building app bundles on CI #58965
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Better codegen for `(T)x | (T)y` #58727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use arcade power source build infra #58651
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #58913
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix lld support #58959
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use caching ConsoleStream for both iOS and Android #58967
    area-System.Console
  • [release/6.0] Set generic type arguments nullability for value types #58390
    area-System.Reflection
  • improve Immutable by checking its Count #58928
    area-System.Collections
  • [release/6.0] Increment source generator assembly versions with every build #58919
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Relax assert to check for simd8 or return type #58966
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix underestimation of temps size #58969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet doesn't run apps from /tmp on Linux #20947
  • Assembly.Location returns empty string on Publish #20939
  • BlazorWasm - `Clean` after a `Publish` leaves files behind #20938

Closed

  • Workload repair ignores planned action #20108
    6.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix EnableTrimAnalyzer for TFMs < 6.0 #20937
    Area-ILLink

Merged

  • Backport `Merge pull request #20630 from dotnet/taparik/blazorAOTCacheBusting` #20936
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix workload pack repair #20924
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Update BlazorWebAssembly targets to work with updated wasm targets #20742
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Vary the cache key for TagHelpersFromReferences on SuppressRazorSourceGenerator #20920
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow declaring DiagnosticAnalyzerAttributes on abstract classes without causing initialization errors #56340
  • Introduce parameter for '..' on XML Literal throws Exception. #56337
  • Wrong Comment token inserted, should xml variant. #56336

Closed

  • @AdamSpeight2008 It looks like there are some formatting errors. #56334

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid several breaking changes in overload resolution from inferred types of lambda expressions and method groups #56341
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixes menu item "Initialize Interactive with Project" missing for .Net Core projects #56339
    Area-Interactive
  • Add support for all parenthesized binary additions of interpolated strings #56333
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements

Merged

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56332
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56331
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56335
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56330
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Initial fix for issue "VB Formatting of LineContinuation Wrong after _ ' Comment" #54559
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Control exposure of tuple fields #56293
    Area-Compilers
  • Update EnC-Supported-Edits.md #56328
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Refactor code to simpler implementation using `_pool.ToListAndFree(..)` #56277
    Area-Compilers
  • Read StorageOptions from solution snapshot. #56307
    Area-IDE
  • Factor process telemetry service out of RemoteHostService #56329
    Area-IDE
  • Use SpillSequences when appropriate instead of Sequences #56153
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WebAssembly Hosted App: Debugger Jumping(double cliking) from Error list to source code at incorrect location #36423
  • Cannot get HubCallerContext.User to get Set #36421
  • Add .ctor(string) to FromHeaderAttribute and FromQueryAttribute #36418
  • Support more ProblemDetails Titles out-of-the-box for Results.Problem() #36417
  • WebApplicationBuilder does not canonicalize the --contentRoot argument #36416
  • Support BindAsync() without ParameterInfo for Minimal APIs #36415
  • Minimal API endpoints do not appear in OpenAPI if WithGroupName() is used #36414
  • Minimal APIs route constraints break OpenAPI requests #36413
  • OpenAPI documentation is incorrect when using custom TryParse() binding with Minimal APIs #36412
  • Passing null to NavigationManager.GetUriWithQueryParameter requires a cast #36411
  • Issues building from source. #36410
  • Analyzer: Warn when passing a Task<T> or ValueTask<T> to Minimal API Results.* methods #36408
  • Improve ccompression of RequestImageFileAsync #36407
  • Startup regression: fortunes #36401
  • Blazor Wasm can't read Azure Storage Tables directly, it needs azure functions or controllers. #36399

Closed

  • Startup regression: json #36388
  • Startup improvement: json #36402
  • Startup regression: endpoint, https, plaintext #36323
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #36387
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException: The client has disconnected An operation was attempted on a nonexistent network connection. #36375

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Invalidate Cached WASM Auth Token on Authentication State Change #36426
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] Bump path-parse from 1.0.6 to 1.0.7 in /src/Components/Web.JS #36425
    area-blazor
  • Test in manual internal builds #36424
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.1] Add CODEOWNERS #36422
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Remove Dependabot `reviewers` #36420
    area-infrastructure
  • Unquarantine Settings_MaxConcurrentStreamsPost_Server #36409
    area-runtime
  • Simplify Guid reading code in DataProtection #36403
    area-dataprotection
  • [main] [release/6.0] Initial Bootstrap v4 SxS support #36397
    area-identity

Merged

  • Bump path-parse from 1.0.6 to 1.0.7 in /src/Components/Web.JS #35225
    area-blazor, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, javascript, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Ensure _Dumps artifacts aren't empty #36419
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Ensure _Dumps artifacts aren't empty #36400
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [Backport][SPA] Update SPA submodule (#36389) #36398
    auto-merge
  • Implement 100 Continue for HTTP/3 #36168
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Implement 100 Continue for HTTP/3 #36395
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Added coverage for developer exception page #35786
    area-runtime, tell-mode
  • Honor sliding expiration in the security stamp validator #36394
    area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/3.1] Handle shortened JSON file in `dotnet openapi` #36362
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, feature-openapi

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: optimize non-nullable column information in CASE blocks #25977

Closed

  • Comparison with TimeSpanToStringConverter doesn't work correctly for 1 day+ TimeSpans #25920
  • The query processor ran out of internal resources #25871
  • EF Core produces a duplicate SELECT statement #25955
  • Test Comparison_with_value_converted_subclass fails on InMemory #25615
    6.0.0
  • InMemory database throwing NullReferenceException when using a nullable value-converted property in a query #25492
    6.0.0
  • Issue with RollbackToSavepointAsync not working after a DbCommand failure due to Geography column (NetTopologySuite) #24818
  • Consider not including a blank line between query tags #25414
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Re-enable few tests #25976

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25971
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • More links to conceptual docs #25962
  • Handle nulls passed to typed equality method expression #25966
  • Generate multiple query tags without newlines between them #25963

Updated

  • Fix to #19883 - Query: null semantics should keep track of columns that are guaranteed to be null and remove redundant IS NULL/ IS NOT NULL checks #25951
  • Migrations: Honor [Column(Order)] in CreateTable operation #25942
    auto-merge
  • Query: Convert result of Round appropriately for MathF functions #25970
  • Add a way for providers to filter out non-identity conditions. #25973
  • InMemory: Read nullable value for derived properties #25968
  • Query: Add regression test for #24657 #25972
  • Query: Enable test for #24291 #25974
